title: NBA player Towns' mother dies from coronavirus
description: The mother of Minnesota Timberwolves centre Karl-Anthony Towns dies of complications from the coronavirus.
content:
Media playback is not supported on this device
'The severity is real' - Towns speaks while mother was in coma
The mother of Minnesota Timberwolves centre Karl-Anthony Towns has died of complications from the coronavirus.
